... store a new DEBH row to be on the safe side (perhaps a debtor ING exists for the debtor client which
is not valid for info codes = KV, BE, BT)
... update CVLR row within separate task, to prevent trouble if the current CVLR row is updated in BDH006
... update CVLR row within separate task, to prevent trouble if the current CVLR row is updated in BDC173
... update CVLR row within separate task, to prevent trouble if the current CVLR row is updated in BDC174
